Package org.robolectric.shadows

Interface ShadowViewRootImpl.ViewRootImplReflector

  • Enclosing class:
    ShadowViewRootImpl
    protected static interface ShadowViewRootImpl.ViewRootImplReflector
    Reflector interface for ViewRootImpl's internals.
